QuestData.Title: Don't Be So Shellfish
QuestData.Description:
I was a fool to doubt Iskha when he insisted there was more to this. He wouldn't be my mate if he wasn't always two steps ahead of me.
We can make it up to him--by taking action, of course. If it's shells that are causing all this elemental chaos, why don't you go into their camp and take those shells right out of their slimy hands?
Bring back piles of the wind and water shells, enough for Iskha to research to his heart's content.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Water-Infused Shells and $1oa Wind-Infused Shells from Soggymaw and Windyfin Gorlocs.
